Ну что ж... Релиз этой игры был в далеком 2016 году. Изменилось в этой игре достаточно многое. На мой взгляд, в худшую сторону изменилось почти все. Разработчики данного творения все делают "на коленках" для выкачивания денег из своих маленьких фанатов, ведь каждое обновление не привносит абсолютно ничего того, что могло бы улучшить игру. Каждое обновление бесполезнее предыдущего. Какие блять новые маньяки и выжившие?! Зачем?? Эти ебланы до сих пор не смогли исправить постоянные баги на ненагруженных картах, постоянные ошибки, разрывы соединения и вылеты. Крайне не советую играть парашу. Сразу хотел бы уведомить петушков (пожирателей кала (фанаты сего творения)), что с составляющими моего ПК все в порядке. Железо и интернет соединение моего компуктера вполне неплохие, чтобы тянуть такое говно на максимальных настройках графики. Проблема заключается исключительно в наплевательском отношении разработчиков на людей, которые играют в их игру.
几年之前看六神直播了解的这款游戏，那时候游戏还没被禁播就一直想买了。现在在看拒绝的视频，我滴龟龟。我已经是361个小时的半个人防了，我滴龟龟。推荐各位一直看视频的云玩家们购买哦。一起享受杀鸡的快乐，杀鸡爽一时，一直杀鸡一直爽。

(I've been playing Dead by Daylight since around August of last year on PS4 and only got the PC version around the beginning of the year, so I've got some hours [strike] in my toolbox [/strike] under my belt.)

In this game, you take on the role of either a Survivor or Killer. The Survivor's objective is to sneak around the Killer and complete at most 5 Generators of 7 total that are placed around rather expansive maps, in order to power up two large Exit Gates and escape to live another day. The Killer's job is self-explanatory: find, incapacitate, and kill survivors by placing them on particularly large Hooks for a maximum of 3 times. While one may think that surely, Killers must have an advantage over Survivors since they are, well, [i] killers [/i], there are actually certain mechanics that allow both Survivors and Killers to gain an advantage that could push one side to victory: specifically, equipable abilities known as "Perks" and items or upgrades to items called "add-ons." There are also droppable wooden pallets and various obstacles that can assist Survivors in losing the Killer during a chase, but Killers have the added benefit of increased movement speed and unique "Powers" to keep up and outplay them.

Survivors and Killers are comprised of a colorful cast of both unique characters and horror movie icons, such as Laurie Strode (Survivor) and Michael Myers (Killer) of the classic "Halloween." Everyone has their own 3 unique Perks that you can unlock and potentially teach to other characters, allowing you to mix and match. Each character also comes with an accessible in-game backstory, which is either a unique story for the original characters or a retelling of a movie's overall plot for the "franchise" characters, usually with an added flair that links them to the setting of DBD and its overarching villain, the mysterious and malevolent "Entity."

As a 4v1 horror-themed hide and seek game, DBD does a pretty nice job capturing a feeling of paranoia when you first play as a Survivor, where you're constantly looking around, unsure of where the current Killer of the match could be, sometimes even when they could be right on top of you at that very moment; I sometimes still feel this way even though I've played the game so much. The game also gives a certain sense of (kinda creepy) joy when you play as the Killers and catch those pesky Survivors when they least expect it.

Even if there's quite a few positives in Dead by Daylight, sadly, there are some negatives as well. There are a handful of bugs in the game currently, which can ranging from pretty funny to absolutely game-breaking, and the ones closer to the right of that spectrum are rather common right now. Additionally, in the online "ranked" mode (essentially the default mode), lobbies are currently dependent on the Killer as "host," which means bad things if they happen to have a shoddy internet connection, unintentionally...or not.

On that note, as any online, rather competitive multiplayer game tends to go, there is a toxic side to the playerbase, which, unfortunately, is a little common to encounter at higher levels of play. There are certain stigmas surrounding certain characters and Perks as well, and certain strategies, although technically allowed, are typically frowned upon by the community, and could net you a variety of responses (if you are sensitive to negative messages like that, I recommend you don't use the Legion, as their Power, being one of the most "broken" and therefore commonly hated in the game, tends to attract more negativity). Luckily, most players are pretty chill, and some are very kind, so toxic players, although kinda loud, still tend to be a vocal minority in the game.

While recent events, such as matchmaking changes and bugs, are [b] particularly [/b] annoying, overall, Dead by Daylight is a pretty solid game, especially for fans of horror movies. Although it is a bit of a grind for things like items and cosmetics, the base of the game still provides a nice experience to get through that. If you don't mind the odd bug or toxic player here or there, and want to get some spooky on, I wholeheartedly recommend this game. More often than not, it's a blast, if I do say so myself.

サバイバー側は一年前は二年前の初心者と同じレベルで最上位の赤ランクになれるようになりました
今は一年前の初心者と同じレベルで赤ランクになればます

某配信者が２００（もしくは500、1,000）時間まではチュートリアルと言ってましたが、今では５０時間やればトップ陣の仲間入りです！！

・強いベテランキラーを相手に俺強えしたい方

・勝ちも負けも関係ないエンジョイ勢

An absolute must of a game. The amount of hilarity this game produces while playing is absolutely unique. Your first few games may be a little bit intimidating and scary, but the game gets better and significantly less scary afterwards. For any new players: Think. Thinking like the Killer is your ticket to Survival. 

Currently 366 hours on record and only going up. Toxicity in this game is off the charts at times but there are a lot of friendly and kind players out there! Good luck! 

And remember, death is not an escape.

I fluctuate between loving and hating this game, but the fact that I haven't quit yet kinda goes with a positive review.
Rank Resets are the worst for toxic and try hard killers, and lets be honest survivors. 

Its a game that no matter what you do someone will be there to B**** about what you've done in the game.

Try the game, have fun, don't sweat it and try your best not to be salty and am sure you will have a wonderful gaming experience in this most wonderful game....

This game is brilliant and is like no other. Its a new genre of horror as a survivor you must do whatever it takes to survive you must complete 5 generators and open 2 doors whilst hiding from the killer that roams around looking for its next victim. You can also play with up to 3 friends while playing survivor however you can also play in the eyes of the killer searching for your prey hunting them down and offering them to the entity. Each killer have their own special ability meaning you can play many different ways lets take the trapper for example you can use bear traps to block passage ways and windows making it harder for the survivors to escape or you can play as the pig a character who lets you play a game within a game!. Once you down a survivor you can place a trap on that downed survivor's head once a generator gets finished the trap will start its timer the survivor has to then search for each box with a key in but only 1 box has the correct key if you dont get the key in time you will be sacrificed instantly to the entity.

fun and unique concept for a game, and worth the money and some dlc too, but if you want to buy this game and enjoy it id wait til summer 2019 to get dedicated servers to fix all the frustration with the current gameplay.
que decir de este juego, puede llegar a ser muy divertido como frustrante y causarte un derrame cerebral

Have I got my value out of this game? Yes. Would I recommend it to anyone? Nope.

Some key things that would make new life easier for players - Blood web is way too much a a grind for anyone starting new. 1 perk requires 3 different upgrades in the blood web which requires in game points to unlock.

Cross play.. the game is not matchmaking correctly at all and if by chance it does its assigning players way higher ranks then they should have. No one does objectives or thinks objectives are farming players off hooks.

Just a disgruntled DBD player. Good luck new players.

Игра убогая чуть более чем полностью. Чудовищный перекос баланса в сторону убийцы. 9 из 10 угроков за маньяка - кемперы или тунеллеры. Почти в каждом матче маньяки используют возможность вас моментально убить или сильнейшие усиления. Будьте готовы что большинство игр вы будете умирать в первые пару минут. От игры ни  какого удовольствия. А если ливнешь из игры с очередным убогим противником - на тебя наложат штраф. Проще вообще не играть. Жалею что купил и хочу вернуть деньги назад.

After 350h+ in the game ive been trying to write a review countless times. Trying to break down the game for new gamers to know what to expect. I always end up deleting it all when I get to the "so whats so bad about the game"

So heres a short version. 

Play 4vs1 in a game tremendously favouring one side (killers). 
Its broken as fuck, and HOW they even can allow this game to still be up is a mystery. 

->You are left in 3vs1 games constantly since... well since its not working. It just stops loading. How BE even have the guts to still charge money for a game that will break down this much.. im speachless <-
Now if a surv decides to DC. The three other survivors are fkked. And the Killer gets quitter bonus points.
If a killer decides to DC? Well if you havnt had the time to do some gens or whatnot you are loosing pips/rank. Great system.
Camping and tunneling is promoted for killers. 
Killers can see who the survivors are and if they bring items in the game, and therefor choose perks accordingly. Or even decide "this game looks tough lets leave the lobby".
Killers are way faster than survivors.
The hitboxes are fucking HUGE.
The last but not least. This community is fucking toxic. Expect to get griefed and flamed.
Most of killers use private profiles. You figure out why that is.


You know what Behaviours response is to all critisism? 
"maybe you should play another game?". Yes. It is true. They actually said this.
They dont care. So just dont download this game.
They are already losing tons of money and players. Why? Since they are an out of touch company. 
Youre better off with another game. Trust me.

Game can be tremendously fun, but it's rare to have a match like that. Instead the norm is 300+ ping in nearly every lobby, abhorrent, "ARK-level" bugs, and an abundance of rage-quitters. Instead of focusing on correcting these issues the devs seem more interested in dropping new content and events. New content is fine, but please focus on the core game more...Currently the lobbies are peer-to-peer, hence the terrible average ping. There's no punishment in place for rage quitters anymore, so you'll experience that in damn near every match you play. If you have 4 other friends to play this with I'd recommend playing your own private matches, because online matches are completely cancerous at this point. Lot's of potential here, but something needs to change to hopefully put the game on the right track.
